name: PHASESoundEventError.Code
desc: Codes that identify sound event errors.

items.name: case apiMisuse
items.desc: An error that indicates the app misconfigures data or calls the framework in unsupported succession.

items.name: case badData
items.desc: An error that indicates a sound event contains invalid data.

items.name: case invalidInstance
items.desc: An error that indicates a sound event object is no longer valid.

items.name: case notFound
items.desc: An error the framework throws when it fails to find a particular sound event.

items.name: case outOfMemory
items.desc: An error the framework throws when a sound event depletes system memory.

items.name: case systemNotInitialized
items.desc: An error the framework throws when engine initialization interrupts sound event playback.
